programme.desc: Boy Barry: Murray's new moustache ignites a feud between his wife and his best friend. Barry becomes convinced that he's lost Lainey's affections.

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: I Don't Know How She Does It: Claire has turned into super mum, running Jay's business and having time for all the duties at home. The kids are happy, but Phil is frustrated.

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: The Cover-Up: Phil has a new client who is also 'his type'. Afraid that might get him into trouble with Claire, he tells some seemingly innocent lies, which lead to more lies...

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: La Frite: In Los Angeles, Gordon Ramsay visits La Frite, a French restaurant that's being run into the ground by its squabbling family owners.

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Revisit 1: Gordon Ramsay revisits three restaurants that he helped - Lido, Anna Vincenzo's and Le Bistro. Have the owners put his advice to good use?

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: Christmas: When Captain Holt gets death threats, Peralta must run his security. Santiago tries to take a precinct Christmas photo for Holt, but Diaz won't smile for the camera.

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: Pontiac Bandit: In order to catch the Pontiac Bandit, a car thief he's been tracking for years, Peralta tries to make a deal with a suspect who Diaz has just arrested.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: All Singing, All Dancing: The Simpsons remember all the great songs from their eventful lives after renting the movie Paint Your Wagon. With the guest voice of George Harrison.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Bart Carny: Homer and Bart start working at the fairground, but because of Homer's stupidity, a fair worker and his son lose their jobs. So they steal the Simpsons' house.

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: Lainey Loves Lionel: Barry takes inspiration from Lionel Richie and sets about creating a sculpture of Lainey as the ultimate Valentine's Day gift.

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: Weird Al: Adam plans to reignite his fading relationship with Dana by taking her to a concert. Barry and Erica worry that Murray may be feeling depressed.

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Weathering Heights: Phil's excited when he's invited onto the local news. And his day gets even better when he meets his weatherman hero, Rainer Shine (guest star Nathan Fillion).

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Halloween 4: The Revenge of Rod Skyhook: Luke's Halloween party isn't going well. The Dunphys decide it needs a visit from Rod Skyhook, some promotion and adult supervision...

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: Unsolvable: Peralta and Jeffords tackle a cold case that everyone thinks is unsolvable, while Santiago plans a romantic weekend away with her new boyfriend Teddy.

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: Charges and Specs: Peralta suspects a civic leader of money laundering, but the police commissioner shuts down his investigation. Vivian ends her relationship with Boyle.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Girly Edition: Lisa is made anchor of a children's news programme, but it's Bart's charisma that gets noticed, and the siblings start a battle - both on and off-air.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Trash of the Titans: When Homer insults the bin men, they stop collecting his rubbish, so he challenges the sanitation commissioner to an election. Guest starring U2.

programme.title: Hollyoaks
programme.desc: Sienna and Cleo's relationship is still fragile. Ant finds himself in hot water. And a new resident's past is revealed.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: O Brother, Where Bart Thou?: Bart grows jealous of Lisa's relationship with Maggie and heads to an orphanage to find a baby brother. Guest starring Kim Cattrall.

programme.title: First Dates
programme.desc: A 60-something raver meets a part-time DJ. A competitive Pokmon player hooks up with a comic book fan. And a dog walker and a science guy bond over a love of pub quizzes.

programme.title: Open House: The Great Sex...

programme.title: Naked Attraction
programme.desc: TV's most daring dating show. Pansexual Izzy is open to all genders. Dom's looking for a woman who isn't put off by his posh boy charm.

programme.title: The Simpsons

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: A Streetcar Named Marge: Homer's boorishness inspires Marge to give the performance of a lifetime in a musical version of A Streetcar Named Desire.

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: You're Under Foot: When Beverly complains that Pops is spending too much time with her at home, Murray takes him back to work at the furniture shop.

programme.title: The Goldbergs

programme.title: Don't Tell the Bride
programme.desc: Thrill-seeking Tom wants to give the love of his life Becca the ride of her life, as he plans their wedding at his favourite theme park.

programme.title: Hollyoaks
programme.desc: Sienna's attempts to build bridges with Cleo backfire. As Donny becomes the focus of a police investigation, Gemma takes a huge gamble. And there's a mysterious sighting at Jez's allotment.

programme.desc: Revisit 1: Gordon Ramsay revisits three restaurants that he helped - Lido, Anna Vincenzo's and Le Bistro. Have the owners put his advice to good use?

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: Couples Costume: Barry and Erica persuade Adam not to go trick-or-treating at Halloween, but to take his girlfriend Dana to visit a haunted house instead.

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: Lucky: Barry badgers Murray into getting him a puppy. Beverly wants to join in with Erica and Lainey's pyjama party, but they won't let her.

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Express Yourself: Phil has the crazy idea of going on a spontaneous trip to Paris with Claire. And Jay takes over their bathroom renovation.

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Man Shouldn't Lie: Claire brings home a stray dog and gets the kids to help her hide it. And Cameron rents out the upstairs apartment to a Christian rock band.

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Capri: In Eagle Rock, California, Gordon helps Capri, a restaurant in a rut that's owned by identical twins Jim and Jeff and is closed more often than it's open.

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: The Bet: Peralta and Santiago's ongoing bet about who can make the most arrests comes to an awkward conclusion. Boyle gets a medal after he's shot in the line of duty.

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: The Ebony Falcon: Sergeant Jeffords returns to the field and goes undercover at a gym with Peralta and Boyle to investigate steroid-trafficking.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: The Joy of Sect: The family join a cult that brainwashes its disciples into believing they will be taken to the planet Blisstonia, but Marge escapes and plans a rescue.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Das Bus: Bart, Lisa and their classmates fight to survive when they get stranded on a remote island after Otto drives the school bus off a bridge and into the sea.

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: Edward 'Eddie the Eagle' Edwards: Barry seeks fresh inspiration when he loses his standing as a champion athlete at school. Sales at Murray's shop nosedive.

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: The Dirty Dancing Dance: Erica suggests the film Dirty Dancing as the theme for the upcoming school dance, but Principal Ball refuses to sanction her idea.

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Grab It!: Jay's favourite place in the world may be losing some of its charm when Phil considers becoming a member. And Claire mistakes her influence on Alex's life choices.

programme.title: Modern Family

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: Undercover: Peralta enlists Boyle's help to track down a missing mobster, Holt tests the squad's patience with practice drills, and Gina pleads with Boyle to keep a secret.

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: Chocolate Milk: Holt's long-time nemesis arrives to carry out an inspection of his precinct. Boyle searches for a plus-one to take to his ex-wife's engagement party.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: King of the Hill: As part of an advertising campaign for a new apple-flavoured breakfast bar, Homer agrees to climb the Murderhorn, Springfield's tallest mountain.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Lost Our Lisa: Lisa's museum visit plans are ruined when Bart glues novelty items to his face. So she decides to go alone on the bus, but ends up on the wrong side of town...

programme.title: Hollyoaks
programme.desc: Donny continues to refuse help from those around him. Leela tries to support new mum Cleo by inviting her to a baby group. And a resident seeks revenge...

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Thursdays with Abie: Grampa tells a journalist about his wartime service on a battleship. The story brings Grampa lots of attention, but his relationship with Homer suffers.

programme.title: First Dates
programme.desc: Will the flames of passion burn bright for fire performer Hayley and business owner Glen? And can tattoo fan Sarah from Wales find someone 'who'll take my bins out on a Tuesday'?

programme.title: Don't Tell the Bride
programme.desc: Essex groom Gary plans an aquatic wedding 200 miles from home. But Lauren hopes for a home counties service. Will Gary's underwater dream sink without a trace?

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Peter's: Gordon visits Peter's Italian Restaurant in New York, where the peace of Long Island is shattered by the antics of the volatile Pellegrino family who run the place.

programme.desc: It's Travel Day and the bakers take on a Japanese Technical and choux pastry postcards. Whose creations will be something to write home about, and whose adventure ends here?

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: In Conclusion, Thanksgiving: Adam exploits his father's soft spot for a popular song. Beverly wants Murray to invite his grouchy dad to Thanksgiving dinner.

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Promposal: With Closet-Con imminent, Claire's on high alert and convinced there's a company mole. Phil goes vigilante when he and Gloria confront Alice for stealing her recipe.

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Crazy Train: When Dede gets remarried, Manny convinces the family to take the train to the wedding. And Jay's ecstatic that Dede is moving on for good.

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay revisits three restaurants - Mojito, The Junction (formerly Flamangos) and Bazzini - to check in with the owners. Is he pleased with their progress?

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Blackberry's: Gordon visits New Jersey to save floundering soul food restaurant Blackberry's. Owner Shelley doesn't want to hear his advice, but then Gordon finds a dead mouse.

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: Operation: Broken Feather: Peralta is upset to hear that Santiago is considering leaving the precinct to work with his nemesis 'the Vulture' in the Special Crimes Unit.

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: The Party: Captain Holt invites the entire squad over to his house to celebrate his birthday, but Peralta and Santiago make a bad impression on Holt's husband, Kevin.

programme.desc: The Last Temptation of Krust: Krusty swaps his old routines for edgier material and becomes the hottest comic in showbusiness. But then he faces a dilemma.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Dumbbell Indemnity: Moe meets a new woman (guest star Helen Hunt) but maxes out his credit card trying to impress her. So he reverts to insurance fraud. With help from Homer...

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: 12 Tapes for a Penny: Adam joins a mail-order music club, hoping to assemble a huge tape collection. Barry realises that Lainey's father doesn't like him.

programme.title: Modern Family

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Snow Ball: Manny and Luke organise the school's lavish winter dance but end up in over their heads due to a texting error. Can they fix it before the end of the night?

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine

programme.title: The Simpsons

programme.title: The Simpsons

programme.title: Hollyoaks
programme.desc: Old friends return to lift Donny's spirits. And it's a race against time as a revenge plot closes in on one resident.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Once Upon a Time in Springfield: Krusty gets a beautiful new co-star (guest voice Anne Hathaway). Mr Burns withdraws the staff's free doughnuts at the nuclear power plant.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible - Rogue Nation
programme.desc: (2015) Part five of the Tom Cruise action-thriller franchise. The secret agents must bring down a terrorist group, but that's not easy when the CIA are hunting you down...

programme.title: How to Blow Up a Pipeline
programme.desc: (2022) High-octane eco-thriller. A disparate group of young Americans unite to disrupt the oil industry in an act motivated by everything from the ideological to the downright personal.

programme.title: Team America: World Police
programme.desc: (2004) Outrageous satirical comedy from the South Park team. A crack team of puppets battle to save the world from an evil terrorist plot hatched by North Korean leader Kim Jong Il.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: LumoTV: Getting Personal
programme.desc: Deepa meets Mary Whittaker to find out how she became Scotland's first deaf BSL minister.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Dancing at Lughnasa
programme.desc: (1997) Drama. Meryl Streep stars in this tale of five sisters in rural 1930s Ireland whose lives are disrupted when their ageing missionary brother returns from Africa. With Michael Gambon.

programme.title: Fighting with my Family...
programme.desc: ...Interview Special: Florence Pugh, Jack Lowden, Nick Frost and director Stephen Merchant discuss making the comedy-drama that's based on a real-life family of wrestlers from Norwich.

programme.title: The Bravados
programme.desc: (1958) Brooding western starring Joan Collins and Gregory Peck. A man hunts down the four escaped prisoners who he believes are responsible for the murder of his wife.

programme.title: Winchester '73
programme.desc: (1950) Western. James Stewart stars as sharpshooter Lin McAdam, who wins a Winchester rifle. But a murderous rival steals his prize, so McAdam sets out on an epic journey in pursuit.

programme.title: Guadalcanal Diary
programme.desc: (1943) Second World War action drama following two US marines as they make advances into the Solomon Islands to drive back the Japanese forces. Starring Preston Foster and Lloyd Nolan.

programme.title: Jumanji: The Next Level
programme.desc: (2019) Adventure comedy sequel with Dwayne Johnson, Jack Black, Kevin Hart and Karen Gillan. The old school pals enter the Jumanji video game again to save their friend.

programme.title: The Contractor
programme.desc: (2022) Action thriller with Chris Pine. An ex-soldier takes on private work to feed his family, but finds himself in dire straits (danger; not the band). With Kiefer Sutherland.

programme.title: Commando
programme.desc: (1985) Thriller starring Arnold Schwarzenegger. To free his kidnapped daughter, an ex US commando must agree to assassinate a South American president. But he's not as pliant as he seems...

programme.title: Les Misrables
programme.desc: (2019) Ladj Ly's oscar-nominated drama, loosely based on his childhood and set in the struggling Parisian suburbs of Montfermeil during the 2018 riots. In French/subs.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Siege at Red River
programme.desc: (1954) Western. Van Johnson stars as a Confederate agent who steals a Gatling gun prototype from the Yankees and attempts to smuggle it south through enemy lines to his own side.

programme.title: Mary, Queen of Scots
programme.desc: (1971) Vanessa Redgrave stars in a dramatisation of the life of the 16th-century Scottish queen. Glenda Jackson co-stars as her cousin and rival, England's Queen Elizabeth I. Violence.

programme.title: Robin and Marian
programme.desc: (1976) Touching romance starring Sean Connery and Audrey Hepburn. The ageing legend Robin Hood returns to Sherwood Forest and discovers that, while he was away, Marian has become an Abbess.

programme.title: The Enemy Below
programme.desc: (1957) Second World War thriller. Robert Mitchum stars as the captain of a US destroyer in the North Atlantic hunting down a German U-boat and its world-weary captain, Curt Jurgens.

programme.title: Titanic
programme.desc: (1997) Leonardo DiCaprio and Kate Winslet star in James Cameron's Oscar-winning epic. Lovers from across the social divide meet on the doomed luxury liner.

programme.title: The Crying Game
programme.desc: (1992) Stephen Rea plays an ex-IRA terrorist who's pursued by a deadly assassin, Miranda Richardson, to London, where a love affair complicates matters. Very strong language/violence.

programme.title: The Principles of Lust
programme.desc: (2003) Drama starring Alec Newman. A man must choose between his stable relationship and his thrill-seeking friends. Strong violence/very strong language/graphic sex/drugs.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Man in the Saddle
programme.desc: (1951) Western. Randolph Scott stars as a rancher who's the target of unwelcome harassment by his richer and more powerful neighbour. With Alexander Knox, Joan Leslie and Ellen Drew.

programme.title: This Gun for Hire
programme.desc: (1942) Classic noir starring Alan Ladd and Veronica Lake. As a cold-blooded assassin seek vengeance for a double cross, he unwisely falls for the girlfriend of the cop who's pursuing him.

programme.title: Anzio
programme.desc: (1968) Epic Second World War drama starring Robert Mitchum. A reporter gets trapped behind enemy lines during the costly 1944 Allied invasion of Italy. With Peter Falk and Robert Ryan.

programme.title: Gunman's Walk
programme.desc: (1958) Western. Van Heflin stars as a veteran frontiersman whose determination to mould his sons in his gun-totin' image backfires disastrously. With Tab Hunter and James Darren.

programme.title: Fighting with my Family...
programme.desc: ...Interview Special: Florence Pugh, Jack Lowden, Nick Frost and director Stephen Merchant discuss making the comedy-drama that's based on a real-life family of wrestlers from Norwich.

programme.title: The Eagle
programme.desc: (2010) Historical adventure with Channing Tatum and Jamie Bell. A Roman commander and his British slave embark on a risky mission to recover a military mascot lost in Scotland.

programme.title: Polite Society
programme.desc: (2023) Nida Manzoor's kick-ass martial-arts anti-romcom stars Priya Kansara as a college student and wannabe stuntwoman who wants to save her older sister from an undesirable marriage.

programme.title: xXx
programme.desc: (2002) Action thriller starring Vin Diesel as Xander Cage: a thrill-seeking extreme sports enthusiast, stuntman and rebellious athlete-turned-reluctant spy. With Samuel L Jackson.

programme.desc: (1950) Western. James Stewart stars as sharpshooter Lin McAdam, who wins a Winchester rifle. But a murderous rival steals his prize, so McAdam sets out on an epic journey in pursuit.

programme.title: Guadalcanal Diary
programme.desc: (1943) Second World War action drama following two US marines as they make advances into the Solomon Islands to drive back the Japanese forces. Starring Preston Foster and Lloyd Nolan.

programme.title: Jumanji: The Next Level
programme.desc: (2019) Adventure comedy sequel with Dwayne Johnson, Jack Black, Kevin Hart and Karen Gillan. The old school pals enter the Jumanji video game again to save their friend.

programme.title: The Contractor
programme.desc: (2022) Action thriller with Chris Pine. An ex-soldier takes on private work to feed his family, but finds himself in dire straits (danger; not the band). With Kiefer Sutherland.

programme.title: Commando
programme.desc: (1985) Thriller starring Arnold Schwarzenegger. To free his kidnapped daughter, an ex US commando must agree to assassinate a South American president. But he's not as pliant as he seems...

programme.title: Les Misrables
programme.desc: (2019) Ladj Ly's oscar-nominated drama, loosely based on his childhood and set in the struggling Parisian suburbs of Montfermeil during the 2018 riots. In French/subs.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Siege at Red River
programme.desc: (1954) Western. Van Johnson stars as a Confederate agent who steals a Gatling gun prototype from the Yankees and attempts to smuggle it south through enemy lines to his own side.

programme.title: Mary, Queen of Scots
programme.desc: (1971) Vanessa Redgrave stars in a dramatisation of the life of the 16th-century Scottish queen. Glenda Jackson co-stars as her cousin and rival, England's Queen Elizabeth I. Violence.

programme.title: Robin and Marian
programme.desc: (1976) Touching romance starring Sean Connery and Audrey Hepburn. The ageing legend Robin Hood returns to Sherwood Forest and discovers that, while he was away, Marian has become an Abbess.

programme.title: The Enemy Below
programme.desc: (1957) Second World War thriller. Robert Mitchum stars as the captain of a US destroyer in the North Atlantic hunting down a German U-boat and its world-weary captain, Curt Jurgens.

programme.title: Titanic
programme.desc: (1997) Leonardo DiCaprio and Kate Winslet star in James Cameron's Oscar-winning epic. Lovers from across the social divide meet on the doomed luxury liner.

programme.title: The Crying Game
programme.desc: (1992) Stephen Rea plays an ex-IRA terrorist who's pursued by a deadly assassin, Miranda Richardson, to London, where a love affair complicates matters. Very strong language/violence.

programme.title: The Principles of Lust
programme.desc: (2003) Drama starring Alec Newman. A man must choose between his stable relationship and his thrill-seeking friends. Strong violence/very strong language/graphic sex/drugs.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Man in the Saddle
programme.desc: (1951) Western. Randolph Scott stars as a rancher who's the target of unwelcome harassment by his richer and more powerful neighbour. With Alexander Knox, Joan Leslie and Ellen Drew.

programme.title: This Gun for Hire
programme.desc: (1942) Classic noir starring Alan Ladd and Veronica Lake. As a cold-blooded assassin seek vengeance for a double cross, he unwisely falls for the girlfriend of the cop who's pursuing him.

programme.title: Anzio
programme.desc: (1968) Epic Second World War drama starring Robert Mitchum. A reporter gets trapped behind enemy lines during the costly 1944 Allied invasion of Italy. With Peter Falk and Robert Ryan.

programme.title: Gunman's Walk
programme.desc: (1958) Western. Van Heflin stars as a veteran frontiersman whose determination to mould his sons in his gun-totin' image backfires disastrously. With Tab Hunter and James Darren.

programme.title: Fighting with my Family...
programme.desc: ...Interview Special: Florence Pugh, Jack Lowden, Nick Frost and director Stephen Merchant discuss making the comedy-drama that's based on a real-life family of wrestlers from Norwich.

programme.title: The Eagle
programme.desc: (2010) Historical adventure with Channing Tatum and Jamie Bell. A Roman commander and his British slave embark on a risky mission to recover a military mascot lost in Scotland.

programme.title: Polite Society
programme.desc: (2023) Nida Manzoor's kick-ass martial-arts anti-romcom stars Priya Kansara as a college student and wannabe stuntwoman who wants to save her older sister from an undesirable marriage.
